section.p: Contains the Date and time and durationthe piece of Equipment was in use.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime with data type Point In Time
The date and time the surgical device was in use.

Contains zero or more [0..*] duration with data type Time Interval
The length of time the device was used in the Surgical event.

Contains at least one [1..*] timeDuration, where its type is Surgery Device
Contains the Date and time and urationthe piece of Equipment was in use.

Contains exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime with data type Point In Time
The date and time the surgical device was in use.

Contains zero or more [0..*] duration with data type Time Interval
The length of time the device was used in the Surgical event.

Contains at least one [1..*] timeDuration, where its type is Surgery Device
Contains the Date and time and urationthe piece of Equipment was in use.
